alert.note: Alert for Hughes; Hyde; Sully (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 24 at 7:30PM MDT until June 24 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN SULLY...NORTHWESTERN HYDE AND NORTHEASTERN HUGHES COUNTIES... At 829 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles east of Stone Lake to 7 miles north of Harrold to Blunt, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 819 PM CDT, 58 mph winds were reported one mile east northeast of Harrold. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Blunt and Harrold. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
